item.title: A7: An aperiodic set of 7 square dominoes
item.description: arXiv:2505.06237v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: This paper presents an aperiodic tileset of 7 square dominoes. We call it A7 as it directly relates to the aperiodic set Ammann A3. We start with a description of the tileset. We then present Ammann A3 and its direct link with tileset A7.
item.dc:creator: Vincent Van Dongen
